verses.text: Ayic ayek' vinh t'a yol sk'ool nok' chay chi', ix lesalvi vinh t'a Jehová sDiosal. Ix yalan vinh icha tik:
Mamin Jehová, a val t'a skal in yaelal ix in avaj t'ayach. Ix ach tak'vi t'ayin ayic ayinek' t'a chamel. Ata' ix in avaj t'ayach, ix ab'an tas ix vala'.
Ato t'a sjulal yich ha' mar ix in a yumcanemi, junelnhej ix yoy sb'a ha ha' t'ayin. Ha ha' nivac ha' ix laj ek' t'a vib'anh.
Ata' ix in na' to ix in ik'canel t'a ichanh t'a junelnhej, a valani to manhxa b'ak'uinh ol vil a templo to ic yaji.
Ix in mucchajcanem t'a sjulal yich ha' mar chi'. Ix och b'ak'an juntzanh anh anh k'ultac ay t'a yol ha' chi' t'a in jolom.
Ix in emcan t'a yichtac juntzanh vitz t'a yol ha' chi'. Junelnhej ix in kan ta' valani, palta a ach tik Jehová in Diosal ach, ix in a colcanel t'a chamel.
Axo yic vanxo slajvi in q'uinal ix vab'i, ix ach in naancot Mamin. Ix k'och in lesal t'a ichanh t'a a templo.
Ha eb' slaj yaq'uem sb'ha t'a yechel comon dios malaj yelk'ochi, spatiquejcanel a wach'k'olal eb' tza nib'ej tzak' t'a eb'.
Palta a inxo tik, ol vak' in silab' t'ayach yuj vak'an yuj diosal t'ayach. Ol in k'anab'ajej b'aj ix vak' in ti' t'ayach. Ha achxonhej syal a colvaj Mamin Jehová, xchi vinhaj Jonás chi'.
Ixlajwi chi', haxo Jehová ix checanb'at nok' niwan chay chi', yic b'at xejajcanel vinhaj Jonás chi' yuj nok' t'a sti' ha' mar chi'.
